title: Short Survey on the Emergency
selftext:
Hi all! I request you to please fill this short 7-question long survey on The Indian Emergency of 1975, for my Political Science project on the topic. Your help would be extremely appreciated. Thank you so much!

[https://forms.gle/WmUsqXVXfT1okShh6](https://forms.gle/WmUsqXVXfT1okShh6)
